group_1.narration: Before my very eyes,@a Witch transformed into@a perfect human form.
The person I was trying to save not @a moment before, who I perceived @as a friend, was really my enemy?!
How do I keep fighting when@I don't know what to believe?
Still…@The only path available to me is @to defeat the enemy before me.

group_1.textRight: Anyway...@We should go see the Coordinator.

group_1.textCenter: Sorry, but I can't let you do that.

group_1.textRight: My name is [textRed:Mami Tomoe].@I'm a Magical Girl from Mitakihara.
I'm surprised you guys are so @calm with a Witch right next to you.
I find an unusual Labyrinth and go in, and @what do I find but an unexpected bounty!

group_1.textLeft: You're awfully hostile for someone with @such a big smile on their face.

group_1.textRight: I suppose you're right.
But my hostility is aimed@only at that Witch you're with.
You're not a good liar.
I never thought I would see @a Witch disguised as a human.

group_1.textLeft: Everyone here is a Magical Girl,@just like you.

group_1.textRight: (They saw what she was, but still...)
(Still they have faith in her@and treat her as a human...)
And when Rena came to help, we@were both controlled by something...
(Oh, of course. So this Witch's specialty@is controlling people's minds...)
No, not her...
I saw it with my own eyes.
I saw her true form.

group_1.textLeft: You've made Tsuruno Yui, the Mightiest@and Nicest Magical Girl, very...ANGRY!
Ugh…@But I've used up a lot of my magic.

group_1.textRight: Out of the frying pan into the fire...
We don't want to waste any more@magic on a fellow Magical Girl.
No, Iroha.
No ordinary person would be so calm @when faced by three Magical Girls.

group_1.textLeft: But I'm the only one she's after.
Besides, I have more magic left @than you two.

group_1.textRight: You even say such considerate things!
I'll give you credit for keeping others @out of this.
But it's too late for regret now!

group_1.textCenter: (Fooling these girls just @so that they'll protect you...)
(There really is no limit to @how low a Witch will stoop!)
(I'll show them what @[chara:200500:motion_200]a fake you really are!)
